Ỳesu Asafo Ankasaankasa Ỳesu Asafo ankasaankasa (True Jesus Church) no έyέ Asafo a ateneho awכteeno wנּ Beijing, china Man Ma wנּ. Afe 1917, Enne, wowo asafo mma beye opepem mienu-nefa (opepem 2.5) ewo aman Aduanannnum so,wo wiase afanaa nyinaa. Asafo no ye Pentecoste Akristofoo nkroabata a emaa. Nehoso womfie wohaaetoso aduonunomu ahyeasae ho baabi. Efiti 1985, na wodua Asafo no ho dawara. Akyere amansa nyinaa ansa na Yesu mmae a etoso mprenu no. Asafo no Gyidie potee du ne; - Honhom kronkron - Asubo - enan ase hohorao - Adidi kronkron (ewurade adidie) - Homeda - Yesu Kristo - Twere Kronkron - Nkwagyee - Asafo mo - Atenmuo etwatoo

NYAMESOMFO NYAATWOMFO NO, YESU MAA WƆN SUBAN DAA ADI Nyamesom mpanimfoɔ no antumi angu Yesu anim ase, na bere a wɔyɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛma Yesu akasa atia Romafo no nso, anyɛ yie. NKEKAHO So Wɔwoo Yesu December Mu? BIBLE nka bere a wɔwoo Yesu nkyerɛ yɛn. Nanso, ɛma yɛn biribi a edi mũ a yebetumi agyina so aka sɛ wɔanwo no December mu. Susuw sɛnea na wim tebea te saa bere no wɔ Betlehem, baabi a wɔwoo Yesu no, ho hwɛ. Ná Yudafo ɔsram Kislew (a ɛne November ne December hyia) no yɛ ɔsram a awɔw wom na osu tɔ kɛse. Ɔsram a edi ɛno akyi ne Tebet (December ne January). Ɛyɛ afe no mu bere a ewim yɛ nwini sen biara, na na sukyerɛma tɔ wɔ mmepɔw so wɔ bere ne bere mu. Ma yɛnhwɛ ne
..........
wo a wɔwoo Yesu no, na nguanhwɛfo wɔ wuram rehwɛ wɔn nguan Nanso, Bible bɔ amanneɛ sɛ, anadwo a wɔwoo Yesu no, na nguanhwɛfo wɔ wuram rehwɛ wɔn nguan. Nokwarem no, Bible kyerɛwfo Luka kyerɛ sɛ saa bere no, na nguanhwɛfo “da wuram rewɛn wɔn nguankuw anadwo” wɔ beae bi a ɛbɛn Betlehem. (Luka 2:8-12, Twi Bible, Akuapem) Hyɛ no nsow sɛ na nguanhwɛfo no da wuram ankasa, ɛnyɛ sɛ na wɔafi adi retu mpase awia bi kɛkɛ. Ná wɔde wɔn nguan no kɔ adidi wɔ wuram anadwo no. So sɛnea na awɔw wom na osu tɔ wɔ Be

Adesua 110: Timoteo—Paulo Boafo Foforo ABERANTE a wuhu ɔne ɔsomafo Paulo wɔ ha no yɛ Timoteo. Na Timoteo ne n’awofo wɔ Listra. Wɔfrɛ ne maame Eunike ne ne nana Lois. Ná eyi ne nea ɛto so abiɛsa a Paulo abɛsra Listra. Bɛyɛ afe anaa nea ɛte saa a atwam no, Paulo ne Barnaba dii kan baa ha bɛkaa asɛm. Na afei na Paulo ne n’adamfo Silas asan aba ha. Wunim asɛm a Paulo reka akyerɛ Timoteo? Ɔrebisa no sɛ: ‘Wobɛpɛ sɛ woka me ne Silas ho? Wubetumi aboa ma yɛaka asɛm akyerɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri.’ Timo

Saa Menli Nwiɔ Kulo Bɛ Nwo A, Asoo Ɔle Kpalɛ Kɛ Bɛbɔ Nu Bɛtɛnla Mɔɔ Bɛtɛgyale A? Baebolo ne bua kɛ Baebolo ne ka ye wienyi kɛ ‘Nyamenle babua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle adwɔmane la ndɛne.’ (Hibuluma 13:4) Giliki edwɛkɛkpɔkɛ por·neia mɔɔ kile “adwɔmane ɛbɛla” la bie a le nla mɔɔ li agyalɛ nyunlu la. Yemɔti, ɔle ɛtane wɔ Nyamenle anye zo kɛ menli nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛtɛgyale la babɔ nu adɛnla Na saa menli nwiɔ ne kulo bɛ nwo kpalɛ ɛ? Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛgya kolaa na bɛala. Nyamenle a bɔle yɛ mɔɔ ɔmaa yɛkola yɛnyia ɛhulolɛ a. Nyamenle subane titili a le ɛlɔlɛ. (1 Dwɔn 4:8) Ɔti, adwenle kpalɛ bie ati a ɔse ɔwɔ kɛ agyalɛma ala a nee bɛ nwo da la. Sukoa Dɔɔnwo WƆ ABUSUA BAHOLA ANYIA ANYELIELƐ Tie Nyamenle Amaa Wɔ Agyalɛ Ayɛ Anyelielɛ Kpuyia nwiɔ bie bahola aboa wɔ yeamaa wɔ agyalɛ ayɛ anyelielɛ.

Suzu kɛzi ɛnee maanle nu de wɔ zɔhane mekɛ ne anu wɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm, ɛleka mɔɔ bɛwole Gyisɛse la anwo nea. Ɛnee Dwuuma siane Chislev (mɔɔ nee November/December le ko la) le siane mɔɔ ezule tɔ wɔ nu na maanle nu yɛ ɛyɛlɛ a. Siane mɔɔ doa zolɛ la a le Tebeth (December/January). Kumasi Kumasi: (Kumase) ye Ghana kuro kesee a eso sene Ghana nkuro nyinaa gyese Nkran (Accra). Nnipa a ewo Kumasi beye Opepepem baako (1,000,000) Kumasi abako sem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a Odi Kan bere so. Abakosem kyerese, enam Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a wofre no Komfo Anokye so na emaa Kumasiman yee kese. Wokyere se Komfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yefre no Kumasi yi ene baabi a ene wofre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ekaa Kumasi dua no. Eno na eboa maa 
..........
odi kan, Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture. Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede University of Education, Kumasi Campus, ene mmiensa bi a ennye aban dea te se KNUST. Yesu Kristo Yesu Kristo yɛ Onyankopon ba baako pe a, oba wiase woanye bone da. Saa barima yi ne wiase Nyinaa Agyenkwah. Se Nea Tweresem ka no, etwa se nipa wuo, na owuo akyiri no, atemuo woho. Mo na yen sakyera y'adwene ne yen aberabo na ewieye mere no aben. Tweresen se, se Agyenkwah no beba a, aman besore etia aman so. Yeyi nyinaa kyere yen se emere no aben. Nyankopon ma yen enkwan daa. Nyinsɛntogu yɛ nea wɔhyɛ da yi nyinsɛn denam yi a wɔhyɛ da yi mogyatɔw anaa akokoaa fi awotwaa mu a ɔrenyin ansa na watumi ɛno ara betumi atena ase. Nyinsɛn ankasa nso tumi sɛe, na mpɛn pii no wɔka eyi ho asɛm sɛ nyinsɛn a asɛe. Wobetumi nso ahyɛ da ayi agu, na wɔfrɛ eyi nyinsɛntogu. Asɛmfua nyinsɛntogu mpɛn pii no kyerɛ nyinsɛn a wɔhyɛ da yi gu wɔ nnipa mu. Biribi a ɛte saa a wɔyɛ bere a mogyatɔw no ankasa betumi anyin ayɛ nnipa no, wɔfrɛ no wɔ aduruyɛ mu "nyinsɛn a wɔayi no akyiri".[1] Wɔ nnan

Hwɛ W’anim Tee na “W’anammɔn Kwan Nyɛ Toromtorom” Wobɛyɛ dɛn ayi akwanside biara afi w’akwan mu na woayɛ nea esi w’ani so no? Nsɛmmisa a Efi Akenkanfo Hɔ Ɛyɛ papa sɛ kristofo bɛhyew wɔn amu? Dɛn na Mɛtumi Abɔ Ho Mpae? Nea Bible ka Wobɛtumi abɔ biribiara a ɛne Onyankopɔn apɛde hyia ho mpae sɛnea Bible aka no. Bible se: “ Biribiara a yebisa sɛnea [Onyankopɔn apɛde] te no, otie yɛn.” (1 Yohane 5:14) Wobɛtumi de wo haw ato Onyankopɔn anim anaa? Aane. Bible ka sɛ: “ Munyi mo koma mu nsɛm adi nkyerɛ [Onyankopɔn].” Nneɛma a wobɛtumi abɔ ho mpae no bi ni: Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmma wonnya gyidi. —Luka 17:5. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmfa ne honhom kronkron anaa ne tumi mmoa wo na yɛ nea ɛteɛ. —Luka 11:13. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmma wo ahoɔden a wode bɛgyina ɔhaw ne sɔhwɛ ano. —Filipifo 4:13. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmma wo asomdwoe ne akomatɔyam. —Filipifo 4:6, 7. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmma wo nyansa a wode bɛsisi gyinae pa. —Yakobo 1:5. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmma wonnya nea wo hia no da biara. —Mateo 6:11. Wobɛtumi asrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔmfa wo bɔne nkyɛ wo. —Mateo 6:12.

Onyankopɔn Yɛ Tumi Bi Kɛkɛ Anaa? Nea Bible ka Wohwɛ abɔde nyinaa mu a, wobɛhu sɛ Onyankopɔn de ne tumi a ɛnni ano no di dwuma wɔ akwan pii so. Bible ka sɛnea Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nsoromma mpempem pii no ho asɛm sɛ: “ Momma mo ani so nhwɛ soro. Hena na ɔbɔɔ eyinom nyinaa? Ɔno [Onyankopɔn] na obu wɔn asafodɔm ano yi wɔn adi, na ɔbobɔ wɔn nyinaa din frɛfrɛ wɔn. Na n’ahoɔden dodow ne ne tumi mmoroso nti, wɔn mu biako mpo nyera.” Nanso Onyankopɔn nyɛ tumi kɛse bi kɛkɛ. Bible ma yɛhu sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ atenka, enti ɔtumi kyerɛ ne dɔ, na nneɛma bi wɔ hɔ nso a ɔkyi. (Dwom 11:5; Yohane 3:16) Bible san ma yɛhu sɛ nneɛma a nnipa yɛ tumi ma Onyankopɔn ani gye anaa ɔdi yaw mpo.

ESUADZE 6 Ebɛn Enyidado na Ɔwɔ Hɔ ma Ewufo? 1. Ebɛn asɛmpa na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔfa ewufo ho? Ber a Jesus dur Bethany a ɔbɛn Jerusalem no, nna ne nyɛnko Lazarus ewu ma oedzi ndaanan. Jesus na nyia oewu no ne nkyerɛbaa, Martha na Mary, kɔr beebi a nna woesie fun no. Annkyɛr na nyimpadɔm twaa hɔ hyiae. Twa ho mfonyin wɔ w’adwen mu hwɛ, enyigye a Martha na Mary nyae ber a Jesus nyaan Lazarus fii ewufo mu no! Nna Martha nyim asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔfa ewufo ho no dada. Nna onyim dɛ Jehovah benyan ewufo ma wɔaasan
..........
erɛ a ɔma nkorɔfo bɔ Nyankopɔn sombo wɔ dza ɔmmbaa n’adwen mu da no ho. Nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ hɔn ayaayaadze wɔ ogya mu no yɛ ekyiwadze ma no. 3. Ana ewufo botum nye atseasefo akasa? Ewufo nnkotum akasa anaa mpo wɔaatse asɛm. (Ndwom 115:17) Naaso abɔfo no mu binom yɛ abɔfo bɔn. Wotum yɛ hɔn ho tse dɛ nyimpa a woewuwu no na wɔnye nkorɔfo kasa. (2 Peter 2:4) Jehovah kyir koraa dɛ yɛnye ewufo bɛkasa. 4. Woananom na wobenyan hɔn efi ewufo mu? Wobenyan nyimpa ɔpepem pii a woewuwu no ma wɔaasan abɛtsena asaa

ESUADZE 14 Ebɛnadze Ntsi Na Nyankopɔn Wɔ Ahyehyɛdze? 1. Ebɛnadze ntsi na Nyankopɔn boaboaa tsetse Israelmba no ano dɛ ɔman? Nyankopɔn boaboaa tsetse egya Abraham n’asefo ano yɛɛ hɔn ɔman na ɔmaa hɔn mbra ahorow. Ɔfrɛɛ ɔman no “Israel” na wɔbɛyɛɛ ɔman kortsee a wɔsoom Nyankopɔn wɔ nokwar mu na wodzii n’Asɛm do na wɔbɔɔ ho ban. (Ndwom 147:19, 20) Ntsi nna wɔnam Israelmba do behyira asaase do amanaman nyinara. Duzu Ati A Bɛkɔ Menli Mɔɔ Kɔ Asɔne La Ɛkɛ A? Yɛnwu kɛ menli mɔɔ kɔ asɔne la anye die kɛ bɛbazuzu ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ Baebolo ne anu la anwo. Yɛbu awie biala mɔɔ ye diedi nee yɛ ɛdeɛ ne ɛnle ko la, yemɔti yɛnva yɛ edwɛkɛ ne yɛntinlitinli bɛ nwo zo. Saa yɛlɛka asɔne nwo edwɛkɛ a, yɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛfa Baebolo nu edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se “” na yɛbu menli gyɛne la yɛdi gyima. (1 Pita 3:15, 16) Yɛze kɛ bie mɔ ɛnrɛdie yɛ. (Mateyu 10:14) Noko akee, saa yɛ nee menli dumua tendɛ a yɛɛ yɛnwu kɛzi bɛte nganeɛ a. Eza yɛze kɛ tɛnlabelɛ mɔɔ menli wɔ nu la kola kakyi. anrɛɛ bɛva bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ Kɛ neazo la, bie a kenle zɔhane ɛnee ahenle ɛnlɛ alagye noko ɔ nye balie kɛ ɔ nee yɛ babɔ adawu kenle fofolɛ. Ɔyɛ a menli yia tɛnlabelɛ anzɛɛ ngyegyelɛ fofolɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi nwolɛ gyima, na ɛhye maa bɛ nye die Baebolo ne anwo. Yemɔti yɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛ nee menli bali adwelie fane dɔɔnwo.

Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

Nnwom 99Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI) Onyankopɔn, Ɔhene Tumfoɔ 99 Awurade yɛ ɔhene; nnipa ho popo. Ɔtena n’ahengua a esi abɔde bi ntaban so ma asase wosow. 2 Awurade yɛ Otumfoɔ wɔ Sion; ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ aman nyinaa so. 3 Obiara bɛkamfo ne kɛseyɛ ne ne tumi a ɛwɔ ne din mu no. Ɔyɛ kronkron! 4 Ɔhene kɛse, wodɔ ade trenee. Woabɔ trenee atenaseɛ wɔ Israel. Woama trenee ne nokware aba. 5 Kamfo Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn; som no n’ahengua anim. Ɔyɛ ɔkronkronni! 6 Mose ne Aaron yɛɛ n’asɔfo, na Samuel ne obi a ɔbɔɔ no mpae. Wɔfrɛɛ Awurade, na ogyee wɔn so. 7 Ɔkasa kyerɛɛ wɔn fii omununkum dum mu. Wodii mmara ne ahyɛde a ɔmaa wɔn no so. 8 O Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, wugyee wo nkurɔfo so; woma wohui sɛ wo ne Onyankopɔn a wode bɔne kyɛ, nanso wotwee wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho. 9 Kamfo Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, na som wɔ ne Bepɔw kronkron no so! Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ kronkron.

Gaana Ghana, ɛyɛ ɔman wɔ Abibiman. Kane no na yɛn frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ɔno ahenkro no din de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beyɛ Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire (over 21 million). Ghana yɛ ɔman a ɔno nyaa fawohodie kane wɔ Abibirem nyinaa wɔ Obubuo da a etɔ so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yɛn nyaa fawohodie no ne Osagyefoɔ (Dokta)Okunini Kwame Nkrumah. Nkuro akɛse no bi ɛne Kumasi, Oguaa (Cape Coast), Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ɛne Takorade. Kumasi yɛ Asantifoɔ ahenkuro. Asantihene, Otumifoɔ Osei Tutu a ɔtɔ so Mmienu (II) ɛne Ohenepɔn a sesei ɔte Sika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) so. Ghana wɔ mantam beyɛ du. Ɔman Panyin a ɔno di Ghana so sesei no din de Nana Addo Dankwa Ekufo Addo. Ghanafoɔ pɛ asomdwoe na wɔn san yɛ nkrofoɔ a wɔn suro Nyame. Ghana yɛ ɔman a yɛn wɔ sika, ɛnam nneɛmapa a yɛn nya firi asaase no mu. Ghanafoɔ aniabue. Sesei yɛn asuaepon (university), ɛyɛ bebree.

Enuanom, mo ma yen sakyera y'adwene ne yen aberabo na ewieye mere no aben. Tweresem se, se Agyenkwah no beba a, aman besore etia aman so. Yeyi nyinaa kyere yen se emere no aben. Adesua 22 Dɛn na Wɔyɛ Wɔ Baa Dwumadibea? Betel abusua mufo yɛ nnwuma ahorow wɔ hɔ de boa asɛnka adwuma a wɔyɛ wɔ ɔman biako anaa aman bi mu. Abusua no mufo bi kyerɛ asafo nhoma ahorow ase, wotintim nsɛmma nhoma, wɔpam nhoma, wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ baabi a wɔde nhoma gu, baabi a wɔyɛ video anaa wɔkyere nsɛm gu mpaawa so, anaasɛ wɔyɛ nnwuma ahorow ma aman foforo. Baa Boayikuw na ɛhwɛ adwuma no so. Akwankyerɛ Kuw no de adwuma a wɔyɛ wɔ baa dwumadibea biara hyɛ Baa Boayikuw a asafo mu mpanyimfo a wɔn ho ako
..........
ɔkɔsrasra baa dwumadibea ahorow bere nyinaa, na wɔde akwankyerɛ ma Baa Boayikuw no wɔ sɛnea ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn nnwuma ho. (Mmebusɛm 11:14) Wɔyɛ nhyehyɛe soronko a emu bi ne ɔkasa a Asafo ti nanmusini no ma de hyɛ aman a baa dwumadibea no hwɛ wɔn dwumadi so no mufo nkuran. Wɔboa asafo ahorow a ɛwɔ ɔman a wɔhwɛ so mu no. Anuanom a wɔwɔ baa dwumadibea a asɛyɛde hyɛ wɔn nsa no na wɔhwɛ ma wɔtew asafo foforo. Wɔn ara nso na wɔhwɛ akwampaefo, asɛmpatrɛwfo, ne amansin so ahwɛfo a wɔsom wɔ aman a baa dwuma

BIBLE MU AKORADE | YEREMIA 51-52 Yehowa Asɛm Ba Mu Pɛpɛɛpɛ Yehowa kaa nsɛm a ebesisi daakye pɛpɛɛpɛ “Monsew agyan ano” “Babilon nnɔmmarima agyae ɔko” Nabonido Abopon no ka sɛ: “Kores asraafo no hyɛnee Babilon a obiara ne wɔn anko.” Wei betumi akyerɛ sɛ apereperedi anaa ntɔkwaw ankɔ so. Nea esii no ne Yeremia nkɔmhyɛ no hyia “Babilon bɛdan abokuw [ne] daa amamfõ” Efi afe 539 A.Y.B. no, anuonyam a na Babilon wɔ no, ɛso fii ase tewee. Na Alexander Ɔkɛseɛ no pɛ sɛ ɔde Babilon yɛ n’ahenkurow, nanso mpofirim ara na owui. Kristosom fii ase no, na Yudafo dodow bi da so ara te Babilon. Wei nti na ɔsomafo Petro kɔɔ hɔ no. Ghana Ghana yɛ kurow bi a ɛwɔ West Africa mantam hɔ. Nkurow a atwa ne ho ahyia no bi ne Cote d’Ivoire (ɛno wɔ atɔe fam), Burkina Faso (ɛno wɔ atifi fam), Togo (ɛno wɔ apue fam) ɛna Gulf of Guinea no wɔ anafo fam. Edin Ghana no kyerɛ “Ɔko mu Hene” na wonyaa saa din no fii tete Ghana empire no mu. Kan no, na ahenni ahorow na woagye Ghana asase no afa paa yiye, te sɛ Ashanti Ahenni, Akwamufo, Bonomanfo, Denkyirafo, Fantefo, ne afoforo a wɔka ho. Ebinom de, na wɔnyɛ Akan fo, te sɛ Ga ne Dagombafo. Wɔne Europafo ntam guadi fii ase bere a wɔne Portugalfo yɛ ntease apam wɔ mfe 1500 mu hɔ. Ɛno akyi no, Britainfo maa nea wɔfrɛ no Gold Coast Ahenni no fii asɛ wɔ afe 1874 mu wɔ Ghana mmeae bi pɛ. Gold Coast no nyaa fahodi wɔ afe 1957 mu fii wɔn sodifo a na wɔne United Kingdom no. ɛno ma Ghana bɛyɛɛ ɔman a edi kan wɔ abibirim ha a enyaa fahodi fii Europafo Nhyɛso ase

BONNIE Me nyinee wɔ Protestant Kristosom Asɔre mu, nanso woankyerɛ me Onyankopɔn asɛm. Bere a Mormon asɛmpatrɛwfo de Bible no buae me nsɛmmisa no, me nyaa Ɔpɛ sɛ mɛkɔ so. Ankyɛ na mede meho dɔm Asɔre no na me waree Mormon asɛmpatrɛwfo bi. Me daeso sɛee bere a okunu a m’aware no bɛyɛɛ ɔtorofo mapa, nsadweam ne mmeapɛfo. Maa ɔne mmea bɛyɛɛ 300 adeda wɔ mfe 8 a mene no waree no. Mpo wɔ m’aware gyae akyi no me kɔɔso yɛɛ nsi wɔ Asɔre no mu kakraa kosii sɛ Awurade buee m’ani maa mihuu Yesu ANKASA. Kenkan Bonnie Osuahu sɛnea ofii Mormonsom mu.

Ghana Ghana yɛ ɔman wɔ Abibimam. Kane no na yɛ frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ahenkro de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beye Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire. Ghana ye ɔman a wonyaa faahodie kane wo Abibirem nyinaa wo Obubuo da a eto so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yenyaa faahodie no ne Osaagyefuo Dokta Kwaie Nkrumah. Nkuro akese no bi ne Kumase, Cape Coast, Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ne Takorade. Kumasi ye Asantefuo ahenkuro. Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei$Tutu Oto So Mmienu (II)ene Ohenpon a seisei ote Asika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) suo.Ghana wo mantam beye du. Ɔman Panyin a odi Ghana so seisei no de Owura John Evans Atta Mills. Ghanafo pe asomdwee na wo san ye nkrofo a wo suro nyame. Nkuro no president edi kan no, na ye fre no Kwame Nkrumah. Ono ne ma, yen Ghanafwo nye yesase se eye yen ye dia.

Twi Twi yɛ Kasa wɔ Ghana man mu. Nipa bɛyɛ pepepem nson na ɛka Twi Kasa wɔ Ghana. Ghanafoɔ wɔ kasa ahoroɔ beberee. Twi ka Akan Kasa abusua a yɛfrɛ no Kwa Kasa Abusua no ho. Twi gu mu ahoroɔ pii nanso ne nyinaa yɛ kasa baako a obiara te ase. Yɛwɔ Asante Twi, Akuapem Twi, Akyem Twi ɛne nea ɛkeka ho. Twi a, yɛka daadaa no nteaseɛ nyɛ na. Ɛno akyiri no, yɛwɔ mmɛ ne akasakoa a, ɛwɔ sɛ obi de n'adwene kɔ akyiri ansa na wate aseɛ. Wopɛ sɛ woka obi anim asɛm wɔ aberɛ a, wompɛ sɛ wofom no a, wobu no bɛ. Nti na mpaninfoɔ bu bɛ bi sɛ: "ɔba nyansafoɔ, yɛbu no bɛ, na yɛnnka no asɛm". Kasakoa yɛ asɛm a, ne nkyerɛaseɛ ɛnna tee. Ne saa nti no obi a, n'ani mfiriiɛ no rente aseɛ. Yɛmfa no sɛ, obi awu, na ne ba ketewa wɔ hɔ na wompɛ sɛ ɔbɛ te sɛ n'awofoɔ awu a, woka no sɛ: "asemasi adane n'ani ahwɛ dan", anaa sɛ, "asemasi aka nkyene agu". Ɛtoaso bio, yɛka kasakoa de anidie ma obi a, odi nim. Ɛno nti, sɛ ɔhene wu a, yɛka sɛ: "Nana kɔ ne kra akyi".

Facebook yɛ chat program a obiara de yɛ dwuma a wotumi ne obi kasa abraa onipa koro no mpo wo Amɛrika na wowɔ Gaana. Nnipa beye 1,000,000,000 a eko 2,000,000,000 na ewo Facebook yi. Wotumi de foto to so na obi atwerɛ ho deɛ ope. Facebook so amanneɛ nso wo ho paa. Ebi ne se obi ne wobekasa a wonnim no. Na oye obarima na one obaa bekasa a onnim no. Yei nti, no obi frɛɛ nnipa a wowo facebook bebree a ɔnnim wɔn maa wɔbaa Haren,Hɔlan. Wɔbaa hɔ no,Wɔwiaa nnoɔma firii setɔɔ bi a wɔfre no Albert Heijn. Koti antumi ankye yeinom biom. Wopɛ sɛ wokenkan saa asɛm yi wɔ %% mu anaa? YiwDabi Sɛ Obi Nkɔ Mo Asɔre no Bi a, Mubu no Sɛn? Bible ka sɛ “mummu nnipa nyinaa,” enti ɔsom biara a obi wom no, yebu no. (1 Petro 2:17, Today’s English Version) Sɛ wokɔ aman bi so a, wubehu Yehowa Adansefo mpempem pii, nanso yentutu ngu ɔman mpanyimfo ne mmarahyɛfo asom sɛ wɔmmara ɔsom afoforo. Afei nso yɛmmɔ dawuru sɛ ɔman no nhyɛ mmara mma obiara mmɔ ne bra sɛ yɛn. Mmom no, sɛnea yɛpɛ sɛ nkurɔfo nya obu ma yɛn no, saa ara na yɛn nso yɛwɔ obu ma nkurɔfo.—Mateo 7:12.

Gyihova Alasevolɛ Neazo Eku Ne A Le Nzɔne? Neazo Eku ne le Kilisienema ekpunli ekyii bie mɔɔ bɛnyi sunsum nu na bɛfa adehilelɛ bɛmaa Gyihova Alasevolɛ mɔɔ wɔ ewiade amuala la. Bɛ gyima ne gua ye ngakyile nwiɔ: Bɛdua mbuluku nee vidio, ayia nee sukulu ngakyile zo bɛfa adehilelɛ mɔɔ gyi Baebolo ne azo la bɛmaa Gyihova Alasevolɛ. —Luku 12:42. Bɛnea Gyihova Alasevolɛ ewiade amuala gyima ne azo na bɛfa adehilelɛ bɛmaa wɔ daselɛlilɛ gyima ne anwo. Eza bɛnea ninyɛne mɔɔ menli fi bɛ ahonle nu fa maa la

Yesu Kristo Yesu Kristo yɛ Onyankopon ba baako pe a, oba wiase woanye bone da. Saa barima yi ne wiase Nyinaa Agyenkwah. Se Nea Tweresem ka no, etwa se nipa wuo, na owuo akyiri no, atemuo woho. Enuanom, mo ma yen sakyera y'adwene ne yen aberabo na ewieye mere no aben. Tweresem se, se Agyenkwah no beba a, aman besore etia aman so. Yeyi nyinaa kyere yen se emere no aben. Nyankopon ma yen enkwan daa. Beberee na wo ne won fitii asie, nanso wonni ho biom. Wodee Adom bi nti wo daso ti nkwam.Nyame ye, na oye ma yen daa! Nyame Nhyira wo.

Wopɛ sɛ wokenkan saa asɛm yi wɔ %% mu anaa? YiwDabi Mowɔ Mmea Asɛmpakafo Anaa? Aane. Yehowa Adansefo nyinaa yɛ asɛmpakafo, na wɔn mu mmea mpempem pii no nso ka ho. Sɛnea Bible hyɛɛ nkɔm no, “mmea a wɔka asɛmpa no yɛ asafodɔm kɛse.”—Dwom 68:11. Yehowa Adansefo mmea suasua mmea a Bible ka wɔn ho asɛm no. (Mmebusɛm 31:10-31) Wontumi nyɛ mpanyimfo wɔ asafo no mu, nanso wɔyɛ asɛnka adwuma no denneennen. Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn mma nso ma wɔde Bible bɔ wɔn bra. (Mmebusɛm 1:8) Adansefo mmea nam wɔn kasa ne wɔn nneyɛe so twa sa pa ma afoforo di akyi.—Tito 2:3-5.

Yehowa, Onyankopɔn a Ɔne Nnipa Kasa Onyankopɔn nam kasa ahorow pii so ma nnipa hu n’adwene, na wei ma yɛhu nokwasɛm titiriw bi. Onyankopɔn Asɛm Nkyerɛase a Emu Da Hɔ Nnyinasosɛm mmiɛnsa na ɛboaa Wiase Foforo Bible Nkyerɛase Kuw no ma wɔyɛɛ wɔn adwuma. Ma W’ani Nsɔ Yehowa Ayamye Bible ma yɛhu adwene a ɛfata a ɛma yɛde yɛn bere, yɛn ahoɔden, ne yɛn ahode som Yehowa ne adwene a ɛmfata a yɛde yɛ saa. Ma Wo Kasa Nhyɛ Yehowa Anuonyam Ɔkwan bɛn so na nea Yesu yɛe bɛtumi aboa wo ma woahu bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wokasa, asɛm a ɛfata sɛ woka, ne sɛnea wobɛka no? Yehowa Bɛwowa Wo Adwene bɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛnya wɔ yareɛ ho, na dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ wɔ ho? Huang Xianfan Huang Xianfan (1899 - 1982) yɛ Chinese historian ne ethnologist. N'awo mu ne N'adesua[sesa] Wɔwoo Huang Xianfan wɔ Fusui a ɛwɔ China. N'awofo de Gan Lan ne Huang Kechang. Afe nsia fi 1908 hɔ no, Huang Xianfan kyeree sukuufo ade wɔ Qusi School ne wɔ 1916 a Huang wiee Qusi School no. Fi afe 1917 kosi 1921 no, Huang Xianfan kɔɔ Qujiu Middle School a ɛwɔ Fusui na ɛhɔ na osuaaa tema ne ahobrɛase ne wɔ 1921 a Huang wiee Qujiu Middle School no,a ɔsan kyerɛɛ ade wɔ Qusi School wɔ Fusui. Adɛn Nti na Munni Buronya? Nsɛm a nkurɔfo ka to yɛn so Nea nkurɔfo ka: Yehowa Adansefo nnye Yesu nni; ɛno nti na wonni Buronya no. Nokwasɛm: Yɛyɛ Kristofo, na yegye di sɛ Yesu Kristo nko ara na yɛnam ne so benya nkwa. Nea nkurɔfo ka: Mo nkurɔfo a mokyerɛkyerɛ wɔn sɛ mma wonnni Buronya nti, mode mpaapaemu ba mmusua mu. Nokwasɛm: Mmusua ho hia yɛn paa enti yɛde Bible ka mmusua bom. Nea nkurɔfo ka: Buronya yɛ ahosɛpɛw bere; ɛne adɔe, asomdwoe, ne papayɛ na ɛnam, nanso ne nyinaa abɔ mo. Nokwasɛm: Da
..........
esu asomafo no ne Kristofo a wɔtenaa ase tete no anni Buronya. New Catholic Encyclopedia ka sɛ “ afe 243 [ Y.B.] akyi ansa na Yesu awo ho afahyɛ reba”; eyi kyerɛ sɛ ɔsomafo a otwa to no wui no, edi boroo mfe 100 ansa na ɛrefi ase. Biribiara nni hɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔwoo Yesu December 25; Bible nka da a wɔwoo Yesu. Yegye di sɛ Onyankopɔn ani nnye Buronya ho efisɛ efi abosonsom mu. —2 Korintofo 6:17. Buronya nso obi di a na ayɛ dɛn? Nwane A Bɔle Bɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Ne Abo A? Ɛnɛ mekɛ ye Gyihova Alasevolɛ ne mɔ bɔle ɔ bo wɔ ɛvoya 19 ne awieleɛ. Zɔhane mekɛ ne, Baebolo sukoavoma ekpunli ekyi bie mɔɔ ɛnee de bikye Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania mɔɔ wɔ United States la bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛsukoa Baebolo ne. Bɛvale asɔne asɔne ne mɔ ngilehilelɛ ne bɛtotole mɔɔ Baebolo ne kilehile amgba la anwo. Bɛhɛlɛle mɔɔ bɛzukoale la wɔ mbuluku, adwelie ngɛlata nee magazine ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ɛzinzalɛ Arane—Ɔbɔ Gyihova Belemgbunlililɛ Nolo la anu. Ɛnee nreny
..........
Russell la boka Baebolo sukoavoma ɛhye anwo. Kumasi Kumasi: (Kumase) ye Ghana kuro kesee a eso sene Ghana nkuro nyinaa gyese Nkran (Accra). Nnipa a ewo Kumasi beye Opepepem baako (1,000,000) Kumasi abako sem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a Odi Kan bere so. Abakosem kyerese, enam Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a wofre no Komfo Anokye so na emaa Kumasiman yee kese. Wokyere se Komfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yefre no Kumasi yi ene baabi a ene wofre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ekaa Kumasi dua no. Eno na eboa maa

odi kan, Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture. Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede University of Education, Kumasi Campus, ene mmiensa bi a ennye aban dea te se KNUST. Ɔwarr Helena Ritz Fathia Nkrumah Mumu-Ɔpɛnimba 31 afe 1958 mu. Ne mba yɛ ebiasa-- Francis Gokeh; Sarmiah Yarba na Sekou Ritz. Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

Onyankopɔn Wɔ Tenabea Pɔtee Bi? Nea Bible ka Yiw. Onyankopɔn wɔ beae pɔtee bi a ɔte. Ɔwɔ ɔsoro. Hwɛ nea Bible mu nsɛm yi ka: Ɔhene Solomon kaa wɔ mpaebɔ mu sɛ: “ Wo ara fi ɔsoro, wo tenabea hɔ tie.”—1 Ahene 8:43. Yesu Kristo kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no sɛ wɔmmɔ mpae mma wɔn “ Agya a [ɔwɔ] soro.”—Mateo 6:9. Yesu nyan fii owu mu no, “ ɔkɔɔ ɔsoro ankasa sɛ afei ɔrekoyi ne ho adi Onyankopɔn anim.”—Hebrifo 9:24. Bible mu nsɛm yi nyinaa di adanse pefee sɛ Yehowa Nyankopɔn wɔ hɔ ankasa. Ɛma yehu nso sɛ ɛnyɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ baabiara, na mmom ne tenabea wɔ ɔsoro.

Ghana Ghana yɛ ɔman wɔ Abibimam. Kane no na yɛ frɛ ɔman no "Gold Coast" a ɛkyerɛ se Sika Mpoano. Na ahenkro de Nkran (Accra). Ghana nipa beye Opepe Aduonu-baako ne akyire. Ghana ye ɔman a wonyaa faahodie kane wo Abibirem nyinaa wo Obubuo da a eto so Nsia, Afe Apem, Aha Nkron Aduonum Nson (6th Ɔbɛnem 1957). Ɔman panyin a odii ɔman no anim maa yenyaa faahodie no ne Osaagyefuo Dokta Kwame Nkrumah. Nkuro akese no bi ne Kumase, Cape Coast, Koforidua, Tema, Tamale, Sekondi (Sakune) ne Takorade. Kumasi ye Asantefuo ahenkuro. Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei$Tutu Oto So Mmienu (II)ene Ohenpon a seisei ote Asika Dwa Kofi (The Golden Stool) suo.Ghana wo mantam beye du. Ɔman Panyin a odi Ghana so seisei no de Owura John Dramani Mahama. Ghanafo pe asomdwee na wo san ye nkrofo a wo suro nyame. Nkuro no mampanyini edi kan no, na ye fre no Kwame Nkrumah. Ono ne ma, yen Ghanafwo nye yesase se eye yen ye dia.

Bible se: “Onitefo ne nea ohu mmusu na ɔde ne ho hintaw.” (Mmebusɛm 22:3) Obi reteetee wo a, twe wo ho. Ɛbɛyɛ yiye a, nkɔfa baabi a ɔwɔ koraa. MA NO MMUAE BƆKƆƆ. Se eka ani a na aka hwene Ohenkese bi tenaa ase a na owo mmoa ne agyapade ne nkoa pii nanso na owo babea biako pe. Ne saa nti na onni ne ho agoru koraa. Da biara a ohene nkoa ne ne mmoa no bedidi amee no na ato anigye ne ahurusidi wo ahenfi ho. Da biara anwumire a wobedidi awie no, afurum ba bi de anigye mmoroso huruwhuruw de ne ho yanam fam, tutu ne nan ko wim de ne nensa bobo nneema mu. Se eba no saa a na agyinamoa bi a owo ho no afre no atu no fo se onnyae nea oreye no na dabi ode asem beba. 
..........
erepram ohene babea a orewu yi. Nkoa no de mmirika koboo ohene amanee. Omaa wokofaa oponko de no tenaa ne so koo ayaresabea. Woduu ho no na won apon nti womaa oponko tuu mmirika tente bi a ontuu bi da de ohene babea yi koo odunsini bi ho. Wodui no na ohene babea aye onyame dea. Na ese se oponko san turu no ba fie, na obedui no na ote nka se wabre ankasa. Ohene somaa nkoa ne mponko no nyinaa kosee adofo ayi. Eyi no duu so no, na eho hia se wonoa aduan ma ahoho, nti woso oguanten mu a na sekan da
